description: This source file defines API routes related to notifications in a FastAPI application. It includes endpoints for sending notifications, listing notifications for a user, and testing the notification provider. It also defines a response model for notification test responses.

classes.name: NotificationTestResponse
classes.description: Response model for notification test endpoint, including status, provider, and target fields.

methods.name: Notification send_notification(user_id: str, title: str, body: str, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Endpoint to send a notification to a specific user; requires admin role.

methods.name: List[Notification] list_notifications(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Endpoint to list all notifications for a user; requires authentication.

methods.name: NotificationTestResponse test_notifications(target: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Optional target identifier for testing"), token: Optional[str] = None)
methods.description: Endpoint to trigger a test notification using a no-op provider; requires admin role.

ctags.name: list_notifications
ctags.pattern: /^def list_notifications(user_id: str, token: Optional[str] = None) -> List[Notification]:$/

ctags.name: provider
ctags.pattern: /^    provider: str = Field(..., description="Provider used (noop for MVP)")$/

ctags.name: send_notification
ctags.pattern: /^def send_notification(user_id: str, title: str, body: str, token: Optional[str] = None) -> Notif/
ctags.signature: (user_id: str, title: str, body: str, token: Optional[str] = None)

ctags.name: target
ctags.pattern: /^    target: str = Field(..., description="Target echoed back")$/

ctags.name: test_notifications
ctags.signature: (target: Optional[str] = Query(default=None, description="Optional target identifier for testing"), token: Optional[str] = None)
